pieces

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
      • pieces.Pawn

  • public class Pawn
extends Piece
    This is the Pawn Class which extends Piece and creates a Pawn Piece for the game.
    Author:
    Deep Kotadia, Chinmoyi Bhushan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean canEnPassant 

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Pawn(1 sq at a time or 2 sqs at first time).
      boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Pawn to move from its src to its destination.
      void move(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos, char promopiece)
      move implements the actual movement, here the Pawn moves from its src to the position specified

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Pawn(1 sq at a time or 2 sqs at first time).
        Overrides:
        isMoveValid in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - is the position the piece is trying to move from
        newPos - is the position the piece is trying to move to
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid and false otherwise.

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String oldPos,
                 java.lang.String newPos,
                 char promopiece)
        move implements the actual movement, here the Pawn moves from its src to the position specified
        Overrides:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - is the src of the current Pawn Piece
        newPos - is the destination for the current Pawn Piece
        promopiece - required in Pawn's case.

      • isPathEmpty

        public boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Pawn to move from its src to its destination.
        Overrides:
        isPathEmpty in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - old position
        newPos - new position
        Returns:
        true if the path is clear otherwise false
